findings.rationale: The agreement remains in effect indefinitely, which could lead to potential liabilities for the Receiving Party long after the business relationship ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information could lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential material, creating uncertainty for the Receiving Party.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party...

findings.rationale: The obligation to return all Confidential Information may pose risks if the Receiving Party has difficulty complying or if information is lost.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
